lines.text: Let's see... what can I do to this guy next?

[Willoughby digs his hand through a knothole in a tree Bugs jumped into who then drops a tomato into Willoughby's hand causing him to think he killed Bugs]
I... I crushed him!
I've done a bad thing, I crushed him, I crushed him!

[Places flowers at Bugs' hole as he turns to the audience]
Flowers
rest in peace, poor little bunny.

[Grabs the flowers while talking in a falsetto voice]
For me doc?, oh you darling
[Kisses Willoughby and jumps back into the hole]
[Willoughby furiously digs after him only to discover that the hole is at the bottom of a cliff]
Gee did, did you see what almost happened to me!
I, I gotta be more careful
[Accidentally steps off the edge of the cliff]

[as he watches Willoughby fall]
Ah, too bad, aw but the jerk had it coming to him, he outta watch his step
[Steps into the hole also causing him to fall off the cliff]
